data.eml:eml: Endemic earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) of the Balkan Peninsula: a review

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trakić, Tanja, Valchovski, Hristo, Stojanović, Mirjana (2016): Endemic earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) of the Balkan Peninsula: a review. Zootaxa 4189 (2): 251-274, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.3
